channel.title: Lancashire Evening Post on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Lancashire Evening Post on News Lancashire

item.title: 'It stands as a tribute to my father’s values' - Zuber Issa on inspiration behind Blackburn's new £5m mosque
item.description: Blackburn’s newest mosque is a tribute to the father of the town’s Issa brothers, it has been revealed. Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Review: Audi e-tron GT
item.description: New e-tron GT deploys Audi’s performance EV polish, says Tom Sharpe Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: 'Are we going to make it back?' - Burnley Netflix star Dave Fishwick on his near-death experience
item.description: Burnley business magnate Dave Fishwick has revealed the moment he came terrifyingly close to death. Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Review: Peugeot e-3008
item.description: Julie Marshall finds Peugeot’s e-3008 looks more like a sporty coupe than a family SUV Source: Lancashire Evening Post

item.title: Iconic menswear brand returns to original Southport home
item.description: The popular shop first opened over 40 years aog. Source: Lancashire Evening Post
